title: [Polar Bears, Underwater]
description: Short ramps lead down to the glass side of a huge pool, offering an underwater view of the polar bear habitat.  Two of the creatures slide through the watery habitat, moving smoothly, as if they are in flight.  Turning and rolling, the creatures appear to be enjoying their aquatic escapades.
